activities: KitApps, Inc. (DBA: Attendify) offers a mobile application platform that enables companies, individuals, and organizations who organize events to create iPhone, Android and mobile Web Apps.  These mobile applications enable end-users (event attendees) to receive event information and enhances the networking experience.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
In compliance with the US-EU and US-Swiss Safe Harbor Principles, Attendify is committed to resolving complaints about your privacy and our collection or use of your personal information. European Union or Swiss citizens with inquiries or complaints regarding this privacy policy should first contact Attendify at: support@attendify.com.

If necessary, Attendify has further committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the US-EU and US-Swiss Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint from us, or if your complaint is not addressed satisfactorily by Attendify, please visit the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR web site at http://www.bbb.org/council/eusafeharbor/bbb-eu-safe-harbor-dispute-resolution-program/ for more information and to file a complaint.
